locations.title: Dectus Medallion (Right)
locations.description: In a chest up the first ladder at Fort Faroth

locations.title: Golden Seed tree on the road from Farum Greatbridge from Bestial Sanctum
Isolated Merchant at Isolated Merchant's Shack
Battlemage Hugues in the Sellia Evergaol

Flying Dragon Greyll on Farum Greatbridge

Divine Tower of Caelid, Godskin Apostle
Sellia Hideaway, Dropped by Putrid Crystallians

Dragoncrest Shield Talisman
locations.description: On a corpse found after doing a long series of dropdowns behind Bestial Sanctum

locations.title: Radagon's Soreseal
locations.description: On the ground floor of Fort Faroth. Requires ascending to the upper level, descending a ladder to some wooden scaffolding, jumping a gap, and dropping down after a giant rat

locations.title: Bull-Goat's Talisman
locations.description: Dragonbarrow Cave, surrounded by wildlife, down a tunnel guarded by a Runebear
